SEARCH
Module com.boomexs.shapeseditor
Package com.boomexs.shapeseditor

Class ETriangle

java.lang.Object
com.boomexs.shapeseditor.Entity
com.boomexs.shapeseditor.ETriangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ETriangle extends Entity implements Serializable
The ETriangle class represents a triangle entity in the shapes editor. It provides methods for moving, resizing, and drawing the triangle, as well as generating its graphical reference.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ETriangle

      public ETriangle (double r, double g, double b, double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, double x3, double y3)
      Constructs an ETriangle with the specified color and coordinates for the three vertices.
      Parameters:
      r - the red component of the color
      g - the green component of the color
      b - the blue component of the color
      x1 - the x-coordinate of the first vertex
      y1 - the y-coordinate of the first vertex
      x2 - the x-coordinate of the second vertex
      y2 - the y-coordinate of the second vertex
      x3 - the x-coordinate of the third vertex
      y3 - the y-coordinate of the third vertex
